title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Apr 09 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Apr 09 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:


We're owed an explanation: Fauci slashes death projection, credits social distancing. Experts never held to their projections. How many people will be scared to leave their homes? Stanford researchers looking at herd immunity as reason for low death rate in California. Herd immunity theory will be fought by WH experts, Newsom will fight, must credit social distancing. ABC News makes up intelligence memo that warned Trump about pandemic in November. Trump was right about need for ventilators. Doctors now questioning need, effectiveness of ventilators for coronavirus. Will Trump overrule the experts and re-open the economy?'


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:


New York hospitalization models were way off. Trump can’t be afraid of Democrat attacks on reopening the economy. Codevilla concerned that Trump will surrender to the ruling class, keep the economy closed. Hydroxychloroquine success stories, dismissed as anecdotal. Social distancing is gospel. Restaurants, airlines will have very tough time coming back. Democrats holding up relief for small businesses. Cuomo admits hospitalization models were wrong, but says social distancing is why. America living under socialism and liking it too much.


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:


We don’t want to have to live under socialism to know it sucks. Too many Americans like doing nothing. Dr. Birx on the power of shutting down the whole world. Acosta asks Birx and Fauci about “conspiracy theories” that coronavirus deaths are padded. Minnesota doctor on incentives to classify deaths from COVID-19. Team Scarf vs. Team Kudlow in White House. CNN shocked by jobless news. Rush is America’s Adult. People have been scared to death into staying home. Kudlow and the economic team need a bigger presence at briefings. Callers want people to go back to work.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
